As a veteran player from the beta, I would have to sadly not recommend this game in it's current state. The developement team will fix one bug and ten or more will pop up from that "fix". The current bugs in game are heavily game breaking and will kill any sort of fun you are hoping to find be it a survivor or killer. The game can be fun as I have spent my off hours from work and school to play it. IF you do buy the game then beware the toxic community. 
*I may change the recommendation later if the issues are dealt with.

Updated Review

1 Year after my thumbs down I started this game again.
It's a lot more fun now, but if you can't handle a toxic community, don't get this game.

You get insulted every second round as killer and every 5th round as survivor, even when you play as fair as you can.

就在不久前，我和其他三个小伙伴去了趟寒风农场，因为我们听说这里住着个长相丑陋而朴实的农场主。我和小伙伴们都觉得来

这里偷电 偷铁 倒腾土特产无疑是最好的选择。果不其然，朴实的农场主被我们兜的团团转，被我们偷走了全部的家当。我依稀记得

那天当我们走向大门时农场主眼中的那份无奈与无助，他只能拿着那把电锯胡乱的挥舞。最后气疯了他甚至把那把陪伴了他多年的

电锯向我们扔了过来没，就这样我带走了他的最后的家当。
   
   在那之后，我和小伙伴们决定出发去下一个目的地，那时一片美丽的庄园，听说那里住着个精明的猎人，会用他的捕兽夹来猎捕

过往的猎物，而这次我们决定给他个教训。临走前，我带去了我最好的战利品——那把电锯，我想它能帮我威慑到那名猎人。
 
   曾着夜色我们潜入了这片庄园。我们决定分头行动，于是我拿着电锯独自朝一台发电机走去，偷个电先，我心里如此说道。突然

一股莫名的紧张感涌上心头，我抬头望去只看到一名升高八尺的大汉带着面狰狞的面具，正在一处草丛中布置他的捕猎夹。望着那

巨大的夹子，我并没有心生恐惧，可能是因为上次的经历，我反而想在搞定一切之后带走一个当作记念。就在此时，那名大汉突然

意识到这边发电机的异常响声，大步走了过来，我小心的规避他的视野，没有让他发现。大汉检查完一圈后，刚想离开，突然把头

看向了我在的地方。我顿时心头一紧，怎么会，他应该发现不了我的。大汉越走越近，我突然意识到是我的电锯暴露了我的位置，

刚想走，可为时已晚，大汉巨大的砍刀落在了我的身上。扑哧~我强忍着疼痛和内心的恐惧飞奔起来。如果我能逃出去，一定不会

再带着电锯去偷电了。突然我的正前方有一个打开的箱子，里面有个医疗包，这一定时汪函留下的，这家伙从来不带走他看不上眼

的土特产，可这刚好救了我。我赶紧扔掉电锯，拿起医疗包继续狂奔起来。几秒种之后，我发现猎人已经不再追我了，回头望去，

看到他停在了那个箱子面前，我心中暗喜：终于根丢了吧。来不及看他了，我刚忙找个地方开始包扎我的伤口。忽然一个熟悉的声

音，响彻庄园，嘶嘶嘶~污~。这不是农场主电锯的声音吗？难道他追到这来了？突然一声惨叫传来，一名队友在我前方不远处倒了

下去，在他身旁站着那名猎人，可他的手中却拿着我刚丢下的电锯。WTF！那是我的电锯，重来只有我拿别人的东西，还没有谁能

拿属于我的东西。我一股怒火涌上心头，朝队友倒下的地方冲去，王八蛋，敢拿我的东西，看我不遛死你。pia叽，愤怒的我并没有

能留意脚边的夹子，刚刚好踩了上去。剧烈的疼痛让我瞬间清新过来，求生的欲望赶走了之前的愤怒的心情。我奋力的掰着夹子，

可这么掰都掰不开，HELP HELP，我发疯的喊道。可，一切都晚了，在我的意识的最后，只有那越来越近越来越近的嘶嘶声。

GAME OVER
Очень интересная игрулька, всем советую:D

If you are interested in this game DO NOT PURCHASE IN ITS CURRENT STATE! This 'game' should still be in early access, there are bugs within the game that have been predominant and known by the devs since before they fully released the game which they have not bothered to fix and at the current moment the new bug on the block completly breaks the way the game is supposed to work.

When I played this game was before the Michael Myers DLC and I have not touched it since as the game has just become a broken mess starting at that point (The game was by no means perfect before then however the MM DLC was the breaking point for me) and I managed to casually rack up 114 hours since the release.

Within the game are perks you can aquire through a randomly generated web of items called the bloodweb which seems cool at first, you can never predict what is coming up and you can prioritise what you want over other things to your own pace. Then you realise that in order to play the game efficiently as a survivor, you need two specific perks which are called Sprint Burst and Self Care. The only way to aquire these perks is to play the characters which they are unique to, Sprint Burst is only avaliable to Meg, Self Care is only avaliable to Claudette. The only way you can get these perks onto another character is to level these characters up to beyond level 35 and get the teachable version of their perk. Once you have done that, you are able to find these perks in the other characters bloodweb, bear in mind that you still need to randomly find these perks (And with the amount of perks in the game, it can take you to maximum level and beyond just to see these perks in their basic form). There is one other way you can get teachable perks which is through a shop called  'The Shrine of Secrets' which using a special currency you earn arbitarily within the game, you can buy from a selection of four perks which changes on a weekly basis. Regardless of how many perks you take every 7 days they will change, meaning if you take all the perks within the first 3/4 days by grinding out the currency, then you still need to wait another 4/3 days until any new perks show up.

I could go on but following suit with the way this game is, I will leave this review unfinished.

Dead by Daylight является многопользовательской игрой в жанре survival horror, в которой используется вид от первого (для убийцы) и третьего лица (для выживших). Группа выживших от одного до четырёх человек появляется в локации в ночное время суток. Целью выживших является нахождение и включение пяти генераторов на карте и последующий побег за её пределы (через одни из двух ворот или люк, который открывается тогда, когда среди жертв остается один выживший и починены 2 генератора). Другой игрок, являющийся убийцей, должен найти и убить всех выживших путем повешения на крюк или своими руками (если взять подношение Mori). Когда убийца приближается к выжившему, у жертвы учащается пульс (убийца его не слышит). Чем ближе убийца — тем чаще бьется сердце, что даёт возможность выжившему сбежать или спрятаться до прихода убийцы. Выжившие могут использовать некоторые уловки, такие как темные места, шкафы, узкие проемы и различные предметы и навыки, чтобы не попасться убийце. Также во время погони жертва может опрокидывать баррикады, через которые убийца не может пройти, пока не сломает их. Убийца в свою очередь видит через всю карту взрыв от неудачной починки генератора, срабатывание капкана (если убийца — Охотник), ошибки при лечении, снятие выжившего с крюка, попадание выжившего в капкан, место в котором выживший сломал крюк, быстрые прыжки через окна и преграды, опрокидывания преград. И убийца, и выжившие через всю карту видят, где произошла починка генератора, где висит на крюке пойманный выживший, где лежит раненый выживший (убийца видит его, если у него есть способность «Охотник на оленей»), где открылись ворота для побега. Выжившие могут снимать друг друга с крюка, захлопывать ловушки, ломать капканы и срезать крюки при помощи инструментов или имея навык «Крушитель», вытаскивать жертву из ловушек, лечить раненого без аптечки, а себя либо с аптечкой, либо с особым навыком «Сам себе доктор».

#UPDATE:
Ok so several years later. The game has its bugs and weird things, which can make pretty angry everyone. However, the game fixed many a really game breaking BSs that the game had. Game didn't crash single time since I started play recently, no big technical issues (such as save progress, connectivity, game lobbies), rank system finally seems to be working. score board is working as you'd expect (perks, bloodpoints, lost/gained items are showing up, summary screen works as well). Match making is questionable sometimes, but it's not terrible and it seems the game tries to find at least something fair play.

The game itself got expanded in realms/number of maps, killers and survivors (well, by DLCs). A bit downside of gameplay still seems to be collision, on the other hand, so far it seems to be A LITTLE bit smaller problem then years ago (not sure whether the change had been made or I just didn't play enough to determine that) but overall the system seems to be more consistent the gameplay more fun as a whole and I really DO hope the game will raise its quality in next following years and not otherwise.

============

Analisis breve PROS & CONTRAS luego de 1000 horas

Este analisis lo edito para compratir en breve la experiencia del juego en la parte final dejare mi primer analisis que lo escribi cuando jugue unas 100 horas.

PROS:

- El juego brinda una experiencia fantastica en lo que a terror se refiere, el sonido ambiental simplemente te hace entrar en el personaje asi como en el juego.

- Si eres un superviviente nuevo sentiras adrenalina en tu cuerpo cuando el asesino se acerque conforme los latidos de tu corazon aunmenten y si eres un asesino y agarres el tino sentiras toda tu furia salir por los poros cada vez que golpees un superviviente.

- Al tener mapas asimetricos oscuros por naturalidad, tendras la oportunidad de jugar con los objetos en tu al rededor en tu ventaja lo cual te motiva a seguir mejorando, tus sentidos no solo en el juego sino en tu vida seran mas sensibles y estaras mas alerta.

- Los generadores que debes reparar, las puertas de salida, los pallets asi como las pequenas construcciones apareceran en el mapa aleatoriamente por lo que un jugador no podra memorizar el mapa en si ya que siempre sera diferente, con esto me refieor al mapa entero ya que las contrucciones no cambian dependiendo el mapa, esto es muy inteligente porque permite que el juego no se vuielva tan aburrido por los pocos mapas.

- Todos los asesinos tienen diferentes habilidades propias pero otras que pueden compartir, cada asesino es unico con su abilidad propias asi que deberas buscar el que mas se ajuste a tu agilidad.



CONTRAS:

- "I think we did a pretty good job so far" (Creo que hicimos un buen trabajo a pesar de todo). Estan son las palabras de uno de los desarrolladores del juego que se han convertido en motivo de MEMES en la comunidad DEAD BY DAYLIGHT, en referencia a que el juego esta lleno de bugs, mi perspectiva no varia muchosin embargo una acoptacion muy importante seria que los BUGS aparacen dependiendo de tu ping en el lobby, mientras mas algo sea tu ping mas bugs habra y viceversa. Si piensas comprar el juego pero no sabes por la cantidad de BUGS que otros comentarios mencionan, creeme, he jugado al juego casi desde que salio y al dia de hoy las actualizaciones han mejorado el juego en magnitudes estratosfericas lo cual hara que disfrutes del juego.

- Matchmaking: A la hora de buscar una sala para jugar como superviviente, el tiempo de espera se ha mantenido sin embargo nada garantiza que te vatas a quedar en esa sala una vez encontrada, motivos? 
1: El asesino se agueva (se asusta) osea el asesino al ver un superviviente y juzgarlo por su ropa ensangrentada u objeto (linterna o caja de herramientas) decide retirarse lo cual hace que se te hinchen los huevos.
2: Tu ping supera la linea roja (150~ + ), lo cierto es que la implementacion de una linea de conexion a lado del boton LISTO ha hecho disminuir los BUGS por el motivo que escribi arriba, y es que si tienes un ping bajo garantizas una mayor reaccion de tu personaje e interaccion con los demas jugadores, nada pero nada garantiza que te quedes ahi ya que si tu ping el alto lo mejor es retirarte para evitar un dolor de cabeza.

- Algo mas con el matchmaking es que a pesar que se haga con niveles o ranking parecidos muchas veces esto se vuelve terrible cuando los niveles se resetean cada 6 semanas, quizas eso no le agrade mucho a los novatos, pero a la vez pueda ser una forma de aprender para ellos.

-DLCs: A pesar que los DLCs no reflejan tanto el PAY TO WIN (Compra para ganar) y es entendible que contenido con copyrightg como Freddy, Cara de cuero y Michael Myers se deba comprar (aproximadamente 5 USD cada uno) a parte del juego base, es una pena que vendan a parte otros asesinos de su autoria asi como la ropa de los personajes. 

                                                                     CONCLUSION:
Como mencione en un punto si tienes en mente comprar el juego pero no sabes porque otros usuarios mencionan el exceso de BUGs ten en mente los puntos que toque sobre ello ya que el juego es en linea y debemos tomar en cuenta los problemas que se pueden presentar para los desarrolladores que han estado haciendo su trabajo. Compralo, es un buen juego y creo quela vas a pasar muy bien, tengo 1000 Horas jugadas y siempre tengo ganas cuando tengo tiempo de jugarlo. Pero algo que si debes tener en cuenta es que no solo vas a comprar el juego base sino comprar el resto de DLCs que comprendo juntos representen una cantidad importante de dinero, son necesarios para disfrutar el juego mas aun.


Si quieres leer al principio estuve enamorado y enganchado al juego
ANALISIS LUEGO DE 100 HORAS DICIEMBRE DEL 2016

Este es un analisis breve y personal.  El juego es simplemente una obra maestra, ver los gameplays es diferente a jugarlo, el juego esta bien desarrollado así que hay un equilibrio de habilidades tanto como cuando juegas como superviviente o como asesino. El formato del juego te permite entrar en el personaje, en mi caso he comprado todos los DLCs (lo cual recomiendo totalmente) y nunca me he arrepentido. Como videojuego es un entretenimiento fantastico.
Algo que debo añadir para futuras actualizaciones es crear un par de mapas extra así como mejorar el servidor del "matchmaking" ya que en algunas ocaciones he tenido que forzar la salida del juego generalmente cuando juego como sobreviviente.
En general son muchos mas los Pro que Contras y lo califico con un 10/10 TOTALMENTE RECOMENDADO.
Now, I think they did a PRETTY GOOD JOB so far...

Игра отличная и интересная, но неужели так сложно поправить парочку багов и избавится от гребанного кемперства? Уже нереально горит, что какой то уебок играя за трапера ставит под тебя капкан и бегает вокруг тебя не давая и шанса остальным спасти тебя. А, что вообще происходит с лобби? Почему каждый раз приходится заного создавать его, к тому же с гребанными задержками и зависаниями? Почему в меню игры лагает сильнее чем в самой игре? А от кемперства избавится как раз плюнуть! Просто нужно забрать возможность у маньяков ставить гребанные ловушки прямо под крюки! Пусть ставят вокруг, в кустах, продумывали такутику как загнать тех выживших кто, захочет спасти своего друга попастся в другой капкан, который неожиданно оказался в кусте или под окном? Но нет! Нахуй это нужно если можно просто поставить капкан под крюк и бегать вокруг него? Еще можно сделать, что когда маньяк находится в непосредственной близи к подвешанному жертвоприношение, будет сильно замедлятся. Эти 2 детали помогут избавится от гребанных кемперов! До этого мог додуматься даже мой 10 летний брат! Но не разработчики игры уж точно. Они же лучше выпустят еще одно гребанное платное ДЛС добавив еще одного кемпера в отряд маньяков. В общем, что хочу сказать. Если разработчики и дальше будут так наплевательски относится к игре, то её ждет провал! А так, советую в неё поиграть... (Пока игра совсем не скатилась на самое дно)

第一次写评测，因为特别喜欢这个游戏，但是这个游戏的bug真的是太多了不得不来写...好容易玩到一段人类，最近把把遇到卡bug的屠夫，带电锯的隐身杀人鬼还有夹子可以放...WTF?真的，bug谁都会有，以为会很快修复这些bug，结果一周了还没动静，我觉得这个游戏基本没前途了，充斥着各种bug和变态单纯屠夫虐杀的游戏，希望过段时间要出的那个什么星期五那个新游戏可以做的用心。不推荐
2017.5.31.时隔半年后又来改这段评测，制作组的良苦用心我们有目共睹，诚然效率不高，但毕竟是加拿大人的做事风格并不是对游戏bug的不作为。游戏本身在变得越来越好，希望behavior越走越远
非常不错的一款恐怖类型的捉迷藏游戏，不对。。。现在已经说不出刚开始玩的那种恐怖气氛了。。。可能是玩的时间长了吧，不过在我眼里，这样挺符合我的口味的，如果说是因为是恐怖游戏而去刻意制造恐怖那倒没必要，现在的压力这么大，工作学习累的时候玩玩这款游戏休息一下，十分惬意。最后希望官方修复BUG的速度能快一点，让玩家有更好的游戏体验。这些小问题还是无伤大雅，总体来说是一款好游戏。

除去BUG外确实是个好游戏。
差评的多半是被鬼皇虐的……玩不惯人可以先玩鬼嘛……本身这游戏鬼就比较强，不要只因一两次较差的游戏体验就放弃这款游戏。
以及请随手举报改档狗和开挂狗，随手传播正能量，谢谢！
正如开头所说，除去BUG就是个好游戏了……不得不说BUG堪比育碧（

So I really really enjoy this game. 
I've been waiting for this kind of game for awhile. It does so many things right and so few things wrong.

First of all the game isn't too expensive, and is reasonablly priced for what it is. This also leads into the fact that all the new maps are free, and the DLC is really cheap, which is surprising considering how expensive some DLC can get for an already heavily DLC saturated market in games. You also don't have to get the DLC to enjoy the new content. You actually have access to the content (for a limited time) through items that you find in the game.

The devs are heavily invested in the game and it seems very unlikely that a reliable studio like this will fall through or give up on the game. There a fairly frequent updates to the game and alot of time is put into maintaining contact with the community, and asking users what they would like to see in the game. There are a great many things that have caused complications with the game whether it be bugs, glitches, or just unfair mechanics that have been brought up by the community, and the devs have either accurately taken care of the problem, or found the most effective way to take care of said problem if it couldn't be fixed. 

The enviroment of the game is stellar and really flows well with what the game strives to be, which is survival horror. They are introducing new maps and mechanics that keep the game semi-fresh and not the same boring layout. The characters that you have to choose from are original and also memorable (I'm looking at you Myers). There is nothing as of now that is particularly game-breaking or overly frustrating. Overall, it also runs well. They also have added in new mechanics to make obtaining certain items easier and less grindy.

Although I really enjoy the game there have been some problems. First of all the game had a pretty slow and rough start. Albeit the game sold really well, it did have a vast amount of bugs, and was missing some core features that the game really needed to succeed for alot of people. For the first several weeks there was no option to create a game/lobby with your friends, and this kind of game is the perfect game to play with friends. It's one of its strongest selling points in fact. Also, for a good amount of months the lobby system itself, and the code and mechanics that made it find other lobbies and games was broken. Not "essentially" or "kinda," but very very broken. Trying to match up to find just a single game sometimes took 10-15 minutes depending on whether or not you cancelled the search and restarted it. 

[[IMPORTANT] This is fixed by the way and now the code that causes your lobby to search for a game works basically flawlessy.] 

To be honest there isn't a whole lot wrong with the game as it stands, a majority of it's downfalls were only present during launch and several months afterward. Most of these problems have been fixed now. While I had to suffer through these problems, those that are looking into purchasing the game should definitely go ahead and do so because they don't. This is also one of the very few games that I would say wouldn't be necessary to wait for it to go on sale. It's a great game at a great price. The game is in a very good path right now and is making a ton of progress. Can't wait to see what else they do with the game :) 

TL;DR

Very good game at good price with alot of problems that have been fixed. 
Don't be deterred, get this game.

鉴于近期的版本一次又一次的削弱人类的话。建议萌新可以从屠夫玩起

如果有朋友的话应该可以很快排上了。毕竟屠夫强的都去玩屠夫了
在测试服呆了一会好久没碰上等人的情况了23333

个人建议的话弹射变成可带可不带的技能了。所以可以先从黑妹玩起（对于萌新）先点出自摸是最重要的。然后弹射带不带的话因人而异~
暂时感觉可带的四个技能就是 弹射（可带可不带） 自摸（只要还能摸自己就是必带）平稳着陆（跟弹射同CD所以二选一吧） 羽毛或者喜欢救人的带心灵共鸣或者看队友送快递的技能（忘了叫啥2333）
不过鉴于带图腾的屠夫多起来的话可以带小游戏。毕竟拆图腾的分真的加了好多普通600恶咒1000 其他的暂时想不起来了。对了 噩梦图。哈登菲尔德。如果你进了。祝你好运 截至目前为止存活率最低的图。而且测试服又被削了。心疼2333


去测试服体验了一晚上。总的感觉就是。你想体验全图飙车吗。首推电锯。哪里都能飙。只要你够稳。全图飙车不是梦 你想体验飞的感觉吗。除了护士。夹子鬼叠满3层怒气就会飞了2333 你喜欢跨窗？但是又嫌弃走路慢。小白脸3怒气让你体验翻窗速度==走路速度的感觉 除了护士感觉没啥加强外。其他的加强都是挺明显的 人类的技能的话。我自己带的是。弹射（玩了一晚上感觉作用比平稳着陆大） 毁灭打击（可以用老头（比尔）的两个技能替换一个是时不我待还一个那个倒地自己摸起来的那个技能  羽毛  自摸 虽然屠夫强了。但是人类排的快了。足够了~

is fun

This game is pretty fun when it works.

I've noticed a lot of games are disconnected upon que.. like A LOT.
I really hope the devs fix this.

Another thing.... is there an anti-cheat in place? 
I've seen killers randomly show up right where you are.. like out of nowhere.

Plus.. I was recently in a game where the generators didn't repair even after sitting there for like .. forever... is this a known glitch/bug? 

Overall.. besides the few issues above, it's a really fun game when you get a bunch of friends together.
Survivor mode is more fun then killer... imo.

I've played as the killer and yeah.. it's okay at times.

In-game chat would be nice.. I know steam has their own little chat menu.. but it's just not the same as in other games.
Even built in voice chat would be cool.. although yeah we can use teamspeak or whatever.


Anyhow, great game and I do recommend it and I believe it's still on sale.

Cheers!
